english.segment1: You can say what ya want, But it won't change a thing. I told ya before-. But you're still not listening. (Hushhh)
english.segment2: Sit still - I'm driving. Speed kills - Don't fight it. You will. You might be comin' with me.
english.segment3: You can try all ya want!. I'm not your property. I told you before-. But you're still not listening!. (Shhhh)
